alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Indian River; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 08 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard, Indian River, Okeechobee, Orange and Osceola. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Titusville, Rockledge, Cocoa, Holopaw, Camp Holly Fish Camp, Kenansville, Lake Marian, Lone Cabbage Fish Camp, Merritt Island, Blue Cypress Lake, Sharpes, Port Saint John, Christmas, Mims, Canaveral Groves and Kissimmee Prairie Preserve. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Brevard; Indian River; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola
